article.Heading: Budget 2016: Don't think this is an inspirational Budget, says Anand Sharma
article.Summary: Senior Congress leader and former commerce minister Anand Sharma says this is not an inspirational Budget. He does not think Budget 2016 will lift growth or even encourage investment. He also says the Budget has not given a fillip to savings
article.Body:
Senior Congress leader and former commerce minister Anand Sharma says this is not an inspirational Budget. He does not think Budget 2016 will lift growth or even encourage investment. He also says the Budget has not given a fillip to savings.

Watch video for more...
